metadata.creator: Tallien, Jean-Lambert, 1767-2705

metadata.publisher: [Paris] : De l'Imprimerie-librairie chrétienne, rue St.-Jacques, no. 278 et 279, vis-à-vis celle du Plâtre
metadata.description: Imprint lacks date; year of publication from date of issues
Description based on: No. 1 (1er fructidor, an 5 = 17 août 1797); title from caption
Latest issue consulted: Nos. 21 et 22 (25 brum., an 6 = 15 novemb. 1797)
metadata.notes: Title is on the cover. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages.
